author: Special Correspondent
text:
The eighth edition of Coimbatore Vizha will be held here from January 29 to February 4.

According to a press release from the Confederation of Indian Industry – Young Indians, 70 organisations, including educational institutions, industrial associations and NGOs, are taking part this year.

The events will be organised under five major headings – expos, mall activities, heritage walks, heritage sites, and special events. These programmes will be related to arts, culture, heritage, education and entrepreneurship, and environment.

Competitions

Apart from the heritage walks, details about heritage sites, and talks and workshops, there will be competitions, cultural programmes and traditional sports activities. Actor Arya will take part in the programme on January 29 at Brookefields mall and honour the “unsung heroes of Coimbatore”, short-listed by a jury of panellists. F1 Racer Narain Karthikeyan will talk about the Formula One Racing on February 1.

To get the complete list of events, log on to: www.coimbatorevizha.com or download the “Coimbatore vizha” app on app store.
title: Coimbatore Vizha from January 29
